subject: Economy
question_en: Which of the following is not a type of economic system?
question_hi: प्रत्येक विभाग किस प्रकार का विकास संतुलन नहीं है।
explanation_en: Income Tax is a system of levying taxes on the income of individuals and organizations.
explanation_hi: काया दर विभागं का निर्द्यांचा प्रत्यक्षेत्र
explanation_en: Capitalism is a economic system where resources are owned by individuals and businesses.
Socialism is a economic system where the means of production are owned by the state.
Capitalism is a type of economic system where resources are owned by individuals and businesses, while socialism is a system where the means of production are owned by the state.
